contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> Name = XXV: The Essential | Type = greatest | Artist = [[Mike Oldfield]] | Cover = XXV.jpg | Released = {{start date|1997|11|11|df=yes}} | Recorded = 1972 – 1997 | Genre = [[Progressive rock]] | Length = {{duration|m=58|s=19}} | Label = [[Warner Music Group|WEA]] | Producer = [[Mike Oldfield]] and others | Last album = ''[[Elements Box]]''<br/>(1993) | This album = ''XXV: The Essential''<br />(1997) | Next album = ''[[The Best of Tubular Bells]]''<br/>(2001) | }} '''''XXV: The Essential''''' is a compilation [[album]] written and mostly performed by [[Mike Oldfield]] and released in 1997. The [[Roman numerals]] XXV are to represent that this is a compilation pieces of the first 25 years of Oldfield's work. == Background == The 14 track album features songs from the first 25 years of Oldfield's career, when he was on the [[Virgin Records]] and [[Warner Music]] labels. Oldfield's version of "[[Women of Ireland (Mike Oldfield instrumental)|Women of Ireland]]" although from his previous album of new material, "Voyager", was released as a single from this compilation album in 1997 and titled "Women of Ireland XXV". The track "Tubular Bells III" is an early version of the main introduction theme ("Source of Secrets") from Oldfield's then forthcoming album, ''[[Tubular Bells III]]''. The differences between this version and the album version are there is a male vocal instead of a female vocal and there is different instrumentation. == Track listing == # "[[Tubular Bells]]" – (Excerpt) 4:16 # "[[Hergest Ridge (album)|Hergest Ridge]]" (Excerpt) – 4:54 # "[[Ommadawn]]" (Excerpt) – 6:57 # "[[Incantations (album)|Incantations]]" – 4:38 # "[[Moonlight Shadow]]" – 3:35 # "[[Portsmouth (Mike Oldfield instrumental)|Portsmouth]]" – 2:00 # "Good News" (from ''[[The Killing Fields (album)|The Killing Fields]]'') – 1:44 # "[[Sentinel (instrumental)|Sentinel]]" (''[[Tubular Bells II]]'') Remix – 3:56 # "[[The Bell (song)|The Bell]]" (Remix) – 3:06 # "[[Let There Be Light (song)|Let There Be Light]]" – 4:19 # "Only Time Will Tell" – 4:25 # "The Voyager" – 4:22 # "[[Women of Ireland (Mike Oldfield instrumental)|Women of Ireland]]" – 6:27 # "Tubular Bells III" (Excerpt) – 3:40 == External links == * [http://tubular.net/discography/XXV.shtml Mike Oldfield discography - ''XXV''] at Tubular.net {{Mike Oldfield}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xxv: The Essential}} [[Category:1997 greatest hits albums]] [[Category:Mike Oldfield compilation albums]] [[Category:Warner Music Group compilation albums]]
